DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine maximum tolerate dose oxaliplatin fluorouracil give leucovorin calcium hepatic intra-arterial floxuridine dexamethasone without cryosurgery ( group I cryosurgery close accrual 10/13/03 ) patient unresectable liver metastasis colorectal cancer . - Determine , preliminarily , anti-tumor activity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study oxaliplatin fluorouracil . Patients assign one two treatment group . ( Group I close accrual 10/13/03 . ) - Group I ( close accrual 10/13/03 ) : Patients 8 hepatic metastasis metastasis great 5 cm diameter undergo cryosurgery prior chemotherapy . Chemotherapy delay least 4 week cryosurgery . - Group II : Patients 8 hepatic metastasis least one metastases great 5 cm diameter undergo cryosurgery prior chemotherapy . Beginning 2 week pump placement surgery , patient receive floxuridine dexamethasone hepatic intra-arterial infusion continuously day 1-14 ; oxaliplatin IV 2 hour leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour day 15 29 ; fluorouracil IV continuously 48 hour day 15-16 29-30 . Courses repeat every 36 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos oxaliplatin fluorouracil maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede 2 3 2 6 patient experience dose-limiting toxicity . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 4-72 patient accrue study within 18 month .
